author: stsp
msg: Add an XFAIL test for issue #4390, "parallel nested checkout not possible
with wc-ng". Extend the wc-lock-tester for use by the new regression test.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/actions.py
(lock_admin_dir): Add a work_queue parameter that creates outstanding
work queue items in the locked admin dir (defaults to False).
* subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/main.py
(run_wc_lock_tester): Add work_queue parameter that corresponds to the
new -w flag of the lock tester.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/wc_tests.py
(checkout_within_locked_wc, test_list): New test.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_wc/wc-lock-tester.c
(USAGE_MSG): Document -w flag, which locks recursively and also creates
an outstanding work queue item.
(obtain_lock): Add new parameter populate_work_queue. If TRUE, add a
work queue item to the database after locking it.
(main): Handle the new -w option.

msg: Add support for lanuage to be passed to TextEditor instances

msg: Allow descriptor to be passed to TextAreaEditor (for eventual use in SyntaxTextArea setup)
